opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant pays costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Root, Appellant, v. Knobloch.
Argued March 20, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Conrad A. Pearson, with him Knox, Pearson & McLaughlin, for appellants.
Eugene J. Brew, Jr. and Norman H. Stark, with them Dale & Brew, and MacDonald, Illig, Jones & Britton, for appellees.
April 18, 1967:
